Description:
All-female quartet Spires That in the Sunset Rise play music that is as oddly enchanting as their name would suggest. On This Is Fire, singer/guitarist Kathleen Baird's deep, haunting voice guides the listener through eight extended tracks flowing with off-kilter folk, twisted string-scapes, and a host of dark, otherworldly sounds that are as experimental as they are organic. This is creepy, intriguing stuff that takes a certain amount of effort; however, once SPTSR pulls you through the looking glass, you'll never want to return to the other side.
